## Getting started

1.  Using p_load() of pacman package to load the required libraries

```{r}
pacman::p_load(ggiraph, plotly, patchwork, DT, tidyverse) 
```

2.  Importing data

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
